thread.title: Mike Perry suspended following Jake Paul loss in Tampa - MMAmania.com
thread.title_full: Mike Perry suspended following Jake Paul loss in Tampa - MMAmania.com

author: Jesse Holland
title: Mike Perry suspended following Jake Paul loss in Tampa - MMAmania.com
text: Florida Athletic Commission (FAC) recently released its medical suspensions for [the “Fear No Man” pay-per-view (PPV) event](https://www.mmamania.com/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-date-start-time-full-results-dazn-boxing), which took place last Sat. night (July 20, 2024) at Amalie Arena in Tampa. BKFC brawler Mike Perry was suspended 60 days for [his technical knockout loss to Jake Paul](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/21/24202521/full-fight-video-highlights-jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-fear-no-man-results-dazn-ppv-boxing-knockout), while Ashton Sylve drew a 90-day sit for [getting slumped by Lucas Bahdi](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/20/24202526/knockout-of-the-year-lucas-bahdi-sleeps-ashton-sylve-with-absolutely-vicious-combination-highlights). That’s according to [MMA Junkie](https://mmajunkie.usatoday.com/lists/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-medical-suspensions). In addition, Stevie Morgan will spend 60 days on the shelf for [her lopsided loss](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/21/24202828/highlights-savage-amanda-serrano-steamrolls-stevie-morgan-first-knockout-win-since-2021-fear-no-man) to women’s champion Amanda Serrano, while Dane Guerrero gets a two-month vacation for [his defeat to Ariel Perez](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/20/24200900/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-results-live-streaming-fight-updates-fear-no-man-boxing-dazn). All other fighters competing last weekend for Most Valuable Promotions (MVP) in “The Sunshine State” — including “ [El Gallo](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/16/24199875/child-no-more-mature-jake-paul-debuts-new-nickname-ahead-mike-perry-fight-tampa-boxing)” — have been cleared to return to active competition. “Chopped it up with Mike Perry last night,” Paul wrote on “Appreciate ya dude, respect,” [Perry responded](https://x.com/PlatinumPerry/status/1816491947017855226). For complete “Fear No Man” results and play-by-play click [here](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/20/24200900/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-results-live-streaming-fight-updates-fear-no-man-boxing-dazn). Get the latest gear [](https://fanatics.93n6tx.net/c/482924/586570/9663?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fanatics.com%2Fboxing%2Fmike-tyson%2Fmike-tyson-fanatics-authentic-autographed-red-everlast-boxing-glove%2Fo-47%2Bt-23347562%2Bp-454259416257%2Bz-9-933971910%3F_ref%3Dp-SRP%3Am-GRID%3Ai-r0c0%3Apo-0)
